summary: Do you know where I can watch the show?
question: Do you know where I can watch the show?
answer:
It’s currently only available in Finland. Finnish broadcasting company Yle has a free streaming service but it’s geo-blocked. If you’re outside the country, you need to use a VPN to access the content. If you already have a VPN, you should be able to watch Moominvalley on Yle Areena. The show is only available in Finnish and Swedish with no English subtitles.

Muumilaakso, the Finnish version. 

Mumindalen, the Swedish version.

There’s a great app for Windows called Flickfetch which allows you to download shows from Yle Areena. It looks like this:

The download site is in Finnish but you can change the app’s language from the settings. I don’t know if the app works with geo-blocked content but it’s worth a try.

summary: Do you know if there’s any plans on the new series getting dubbed in Danish?
question: Do you know if there’s any plans on the new series getting dubbed in Danish?
answer:
I haven’t heard anything. Looks like it’s only Sweden and Finland that gets their own thing, which is understandable but ohhh I need a Norwegian one 😩 and you need a danish one!! Let’s cry and colllect our tears in a moomin mug, put a little sponge in it that soakes it up. We cut the mini-sponge in half and put it in our vial-necklaces. One for you, one for me. Now our sadness & frustration will bring upon a new dawn.. a danish&norwegian moomin megamix type of dawn! we just need patience!

So now… we play the waiting game

summary: Do I remember correctly that you are Norwegian? There's a Swedish dubbed version of Moomin Valley. Not sure how much you are...
question: Do I remember correctly that you are Norwegian? There's a Swedish dubbed version of Moomin Valley. Not sure how much you are able to understand but I guess it's still better than Finnish?
answer:
(2) And oh, forgot to mention in the previous ask: Finnish public broadcasting company has this site called Yle Areena where you can watch Moominvalley for free without even registering. Not sure if it is region locked but it can be worth trying.

Yes I’m norwegian and yes omg Swedish I can understand very well actually. Finnish? Weeeelll.. not so much (not at all). thanks love!

title: Snufkin and Little My
body:
So far the new Moomin show, Moominvalley, is just absolutly beautiful. ♥ 

However one thing I’m very curious about is if they’ll adress the fact Snufkin and Little My are (half)-siblings. The 90s-show put them as just as friends, with one episode where Little My told Snufkin to date her. 
(Yeah, it was a weird episode, but to be fair they were never portrayed as siblings in the 90s-show. I’m not even sure if they show-runners knew this). 

The new show, Moominvalley, is said to be based on the original books though, so I have high hopes their (Snufkin’s and Little My) relationship as siblings will be adressed at some point. 

[Spoilers for the first 3 episodes below the “Read More”!] 

The first episode of Moominvalley portrayed Moomin meeting Little My (and most of her family), and despite how Moomin didn’t talk about Snufkin in the episode… At the end Little My showed she at least knows who Snufkin is.

It’s only after that which Moomin mentions Snufkin’s name for the first time in the episode, unless I’ve missed something. So, if Little My and Snufkin “haven’t met” before this, how did she know about Snufkin? 

Once Snufkin actually arrives to Moominvalley Little My also keeps trying to meet Snufkin, but fails to do so. With other words they have yet to officially meet on screen in the show. Could this mean their sibling-relationship will be adressed and developed in Moominvalley? 

You could argue Little My just wanted to follow Moomin around to annoy him, but I find it curious that we’re 3 episodes in without Little My even being seen having met Snufkin, despite having been in the show since ep.01. 

(To be fair we haven’t seen Sniff and the others meet Snufkin on screen either, yet, - and in the writing moment we’re so far we only 3 episodes into Moominvalley; but unlike the others Little My now lives in the Moomin-house).

Maybe I’m just getting my hopes up, and see hints where there are none, but I really do hope Snufkin’s and Little My’s sibling-relationship will be adressed in the Moominvalley show.  ♥ :) (Snufkin’s family in general being adressed would be awesome, really. Who knows? Maybe we even will get to see Snufkin meeting his father, Joxter, this time around - just as he did in the books).

blog.name: renhet
blog.title: Ren Art
blog.description: Hi, I'm Ren. I am a freelance digital artist. I work in Paint Tool Sai and Clip Studio Paint, and I use a Wacom Intuos3 9x12. You are welcome to use (but not edit) my artwork for personal use with visible credit, but please ask for anything else. Do not reupload.
